node.name: P4Eclipse
node.shortdescription:
New in P4Eclipse 2012.3 is support for Eclipse 3.7, 3.8 and 4.2 with Perforce Streams and P4Sandbox, and the Mylyn 3.8 task management system.

P4Eclipse, the Perforce Plug-in for Eclipse, seamlessly integrates the strengths of Perforce's software version management system with Eclipse's powerful IDE. Implemented as a pure Java solution, P4Eclipse provides a developer-oriented set of features from within the Eclipse Team framework that support a wide range of Agile and traditional development workflows.
node.body:
New in P4Eclipse 2012.3 is support for Eclipse 3.7, 3.8 and 4.2 with Perforce Streams and P4Sandbox, and the Mylyn 3.8 task management system.

P4Eclipse, the Perforce Plug-in for Eclipse, seamlessly integrates the strengths of Perforce's software version management system with Eclipse's powerful IDE. Implemented as a pure Java solution, P4Eclipse provides a developer-oriented set of features from within the Eclipse Team framework that support a wide range of Agile and traditional development workflows.
